entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind east 20 km/h except northeast 50 gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
